pageContext.claim: “John Kerry has made it very tough because -- and I think he's totally violated the Logan Act. John Kerry has made it very tough because he's telling them or he has told them, I think, now he knows that we're looking at the Logan Act with respect to him.”
pageContext.analysis: Kerry, the former secretary of state, said he had one conversation with the Iranian foreign minister in Germany after Trump withdrew the United States from the Iran nuclear deal. He denied any inappropriate contacts.
